Related repos

  • Reconstructs 3D scenes from 1000+ images in one forward pass
  • Perceives 3D scenes from videos and photo collections with a persistent state
  • Upscale, denoise, and interpolate videos
  • 3D reconstruction from monocular endoscopic video
  • Turn images into cinematic videos with 33 facial expressions and 400+ motion combinations
  • RGB SLAM baseline using monocular depth and Gaussian scene mapping, easy to try out for 3D reconstruction from video
  • Generates 3D scenes from text and images
  • code for 3Blue1Brown math video animations
  • Multimodal foundation models for video understanding
  • turn any mp4 video into a 3d point cloud in real time
